original_text: The land went from the Arnon river in the south to the Jabbok river in the north. It went from the desert in the east to the Jordan River in the west.
korean_text: 아르논에서부터 얍복까지와 광야에서부터 요단까지 아모리 족속의 온 지역을 점령하였느니라

sentences.original_text: The land went from the Arnon river in the south
sentences.korean_translation: 그 땅은 남쪽의 아르논 강에서부터 시작되었고

sentences.original_text: to the Jabbok river in the north
It went from the desert in the east
to the Jordan River in the west
